duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all aspects of new, renewal and prospective reinsurance account business.
Coordinate broking placement activities for client accounts.
Design new reinsurance programs for clients’ needs.
Develop and present new, renewal, and prospective presentations to clients and reinsurers.
Oversee the timely production of appropriate account/program documents.
Liaise with service departments to ensure proper client service and timely flow of business process.
Monitor the follow-up on contract documentation and respond to client queries and concerns.
Establish and maintain strong relationships with reinsurance underwriters, clients, colleagues, and other operating entities.
Manage expenses, time, services, etc. in order to maximize profits.
Oversee documentation of all external communications in accordance with procedures.
Maintain comprehensive knowledge of reinsurer capabilities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or foreign equivalent in Economics or a related field (Master's preferred)
